item.description:
Allu Arjun's Iconic Pushpa 2 Beard Gone: Actor Ready for Next Project with Trivikram

Published on Jan 1, 2025 4:00 pm IST

Allu Arjun, the actor who took the box office by storm with his latest blockbuster 'Pushpa 2: The Rule,' has shaved off his signature beard after five years. Fans are eagerly awaiting his new look on social media. Meanwhile, the superstar is gearing up for his next project with celebrated director Trivikram, with official details expected soon.

item.title: Rajiv Kapoor was addicted to alcohol, Khushbu Sundar says everyone was very worried for him: ‘We spoke a day before his death’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Khushbu Sundar Reflects on Rajiv Kapoor's Struggles with Alcohol Addiction Before His Untimely Death

Publication Date: January 2021 | Source: The Indian Express

Khushbu Sundar reminisces about her close friendship with Rajiv Kapoor, revealing his struggle with alcohol addiction and its impact on his health. She shared their last conversation and acknowledged the shock of his sudden passing.

  • Rajiv Kapoor, brother of Rishi and Randhir Kapoor, passed away at 58 from a heart attack.
  • Khushbu Sundar discussed Rajiv's alcohol addiction and its effects on his overall health.
  • She expressed her feelings of shock upon learning of his death a day after speaking with him.
  • The two shared a friendship that involved regular meals and deep connections.
  • Khushbu lamented about losing touch with Rajiv's family after his passing.
“I spoke to Chimpu just a day before his death. He was down with very high fever and during COVID-19 he was taking his health lightly.” - Khushbu Sundar

Khushbu's reflections highlight the struggles Rajiv faced and the deep bond they shared, revealing the tragic loss of a vibrant person.

item.title: Ileana D'Cruz sparks pregnancy rumors with New Year post - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ileana D'Cruz sparks pregnancy rumors with New Year post

Date & Source: Dec 31, 2023 | Times of India

Introduction: Actress Ileana D'Cruz has sparked rumors of pregnancy after sharing a cryptic New Year post on social media, hinting at a major life change.

  • Key Points:
    • Ileana D'Cruz shared a New Year post on Instagram, showing her lying in bed with her hand on her stomach.
    • The post has led to speculation that she may be pregnant.
    • The actress has not confirmed the rumors yet.
  • Notable Quotes or Statistics:
    Ileana D'Cruz's New Year post has sparked speculation about her pregnancy.
  • Conclusion:

    While Ileana D'Cruz has not confirmed the rumors, her New Year post has led to speculation about her pregnancy. Fans are eagerly awaiting official news from the actress.

item.title: 7/G Brindavan Colony 2 first look poster revealed - 123telugu
item.description:
First Look Poster of 7/G Brindavan Colony 2 Unveiled

Publication date: January 1, 2025 Source: 123telugu.com

Director Selva Raghavan announces the sequel to the classic film 7/G Brundavan Colony, thrilling fans with a new title and first look poster.

  • The sequel is titled 7/G Rainbow Colony 2 (Tamil) and 7/G Brindavan Colony 2 (Telugu).
  • Ravi Krishna will reprise his lead role, with Anaswara Rajan as his romantic interest.
  • The film is presented by AM Ratnam and will feature music by Yuvan Shankar Raja.
  • Shooting is nearing completion, with fans excited for more updates.
“Fans are eagerly awaiting further updates on this exciting sequel.”

This sequel aims to capture the charm of the original while introducing a new generation to the story.

item.title: Naga Vamsi says he wasn't disrespectful towards Boney Kapoor: ‘Don't need to teach us how to respect elders' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Naga Vamsi says he wasn't disrespectful towards Boney Kapoor: ‘Don't need to teach us how to respect elders'

Date: Jan 01, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

During a recent roundtable chat, producer Naga Vamsi denied claims of disrespect towards Boney Kapoor while discussing the influence of south cinema on Bollywood.

  • Vamsi clarified there was 'no disrespect' during the conversation.
  • He claimed that Boney is more respected in the south than in Bollywood.
  • Vamsi highlighted how south Indian cinema has evolved and influenced Bollywood.
  • The discussion led to social media backlash and critiques from industry peers.
Naga Vamsi stated, “You don’t need to teach us how to respect elders, we respect boney ji more than u guys do and there was no disrespect towards boney ji in that conversation…”

The exchange signals ongoing tensions and dialogues between south Indian cinema and Bollywood, showing a growing recognition of regional influences in the film industry.

item.title: SSMB 29: Rajamouli-Mahesh Babu film launch date locked? - 123telugu
item.description:
SSMB 29: Rajamouli-Mahesh Babu Film Launch Date Locked?

Published on: Jan 1, 2025 11:50 am IST

Global sensations SS Rajamouli and Superstar Mahesh Babu are set for a collaboration in the film tentatively titled SSMB 29. Exciting news for fans has emerged regarding its impending launch.

  • The movie's official launch is scheduled for January 2, 2025, at Aluminium Factory in Hyderabad.
  • The event is expected to start after 10 AM, with key team members in attendance.
  • Produced by KL Narayana under Durga Arts, the film has a script by Vijayendra Prasad and music composed by Oscar-winner MM Keeravaani.
  • Rumors suggest Priyanka Chopra may be the female lead and Prithviraj Sukumaran as the antagonist, although these details are yet to be confirmed.
“Stay tuned for more updates as this epic project unfolds.”

This collaboration between Rajamouli and Mahesh Babu promises to be an exciting addition to Telugu cinema, with high expectations from fans for its global appeal.

item.title: Mouni Roy falls on pavement while celebrating New Year with hubby Suraj Nambiar and BFF Disha Patani - WA - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mouni Roy Falls While Celebrating New Year with Suraj Nambiar and Disha Patani

Publication Date: January 1, 2023 Source: Times of India

Bollywood actress Mouni Roy experienced a mishap while celebrating the New Year with her husband Suraj Nambiar and best friend Disha Patani. A viral video captured the moment she fell on the pavement, surprising onlookers.

  • Mouni was seen celebrating with her husband and best friend.
  • A video of her falling went viral on social media.
  • Disha Patani and Suraj Nambiar quickly helped her up.
  • Mouni laughed off the incident and continued her celebrations.
  • Fans shared mixed reactions online, expressing concern and finding the moment relatable.
  • Upcoming projects for Mouni include the film 'Salakaar' and Disha will appear in 'Welcome To The Jungle'.
“Hope she’s okay!” - Comment from a concerned fan.

Despite the fall, Mouni appeared unhurt and was able to enjoy the festive atmosphere in Bandra alongside her friends.

item.title: Mouni Roy falls on pavement while celebrating New Year with hubby Suraj Nambiar and BFF Disha Patani - WA - The Times of India
item.description:
Mouni Roy falls on pavement while celebrating New Year with hubby Suraj Nambiar and BFF Disha Patani - WATCH

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Mouni Roy recently celebrated the New Year with her husband Suraj Nambiar and friend Disha Patani, but the festivities took a turn when she fell on the pavement. The incident was captured on video.

  • Mouni Roy was out celebrating for New Year’s Eve.
  • She was accompanied by husband Suraj Nambiar and actress Disha Patani.
  • A video of the incident has circulated on social media.
“It’s all part of the fun!” - Instagram caption from Mouni Roy.

While falls can be alarming, Mouni appears to be in good spirits following the incident.

item.title: Anurag Kashyap says Bollywood lacks the 'brains' to make a film like Pushpa: ‘Everyone is trying to create a universe’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Anurag Kashyap critiques Bollywood's filmmaking capabilities

Publication Date: Jan 01, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Anurag Kashyap has criticized the Hindi film industry for lacking the creativity and intellect to create films like 'Pushpa: The Rise' and its sequel 'Pushpa 2: The Rule'. He argues that Bollywood is focusing on creating franchises instead of fostering original filmmaking.

  • Kashyap states Bollywood filmmakers lack the necessary skills to create works like 'Pushpa'.
  • Pushpa 2 is recognized as the highest-grossing Indian film of 2024, surpassing ₹1760 crore globally.
  • Kashyap expresses frustration with the studio model in India that limits creative expression.
  • His recent film 'Kennedy' has been well-received internationally but struggles for a domestic release.
“They don’t understand anything. They can’t even make a Pushpa. They cannot, because they don’t have the brains to make a film.” - Anurag Kashyap

Kashyap's remarks highlight a growing concern over the state of creativity in Bollywood, suggesting a need for change if filmmakers wish to compete globally.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor Runs To Hug Alia Bhatt As They Celebrate New Year 2025 With Neetu Kapoor, Riddhima | Watch - News18
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor Runs To Hug Alia Bhatt As They Celebrate New Year 2025 With Neetu Kapoor, Riddhima | Watch

Date & Source: January 01, 2025, 15:47 IST, News18

Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt welcomed 2025 with a passionate hug and fireworks, celebrating the new year with their close friends and family at a tropical location. The couple was joined by Neetu Kapoor, Shaheen Bhatt, Soni Razdan, and their daughter Raha.

  • Ranbir ran to hug Alia as the clock struck 12, with fireworks in the background.
  • Alia and Ranbir spent the holiday in a tropical location with a large pool.
  • The couple's daughter, Raha, also joined them for the celebrations.
  • Neetu Kapoor shared glimpses of the vacation on Instagram.
  • Ranbir and Alia will next be seen together in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Love and War'.

Conclusion: The Bollywood couple, along with their families, rang in the new year with love, warmth, and joy, setting the stage for a promising 2025.

item.description:
Akhil and Zainab Ravdjee’s Elegant Mirror Selfie Wins Hearts

Published on: Jan 1, 2025 10:11 am IST

Akhil Akkineni, a popular Telugu actor, has recently shared a charming mirror selfie with his fiancée, Zainab Ravdjee. The couple's graceful appearance has garnered admiration from fans.

  • Akhil's upcoming film is tentatively titled 'Lenin' and directed by Murali Kishore Abburu.
  • Sreeleela will star as the female lead in the film.
  • The mirror selfie, taken by Zainab, displays their elegant look, winning over their fans.
  • Details about their wedding and Akhil's next film project remain undisclosed.

“The couple’s elegant appearance in the picture has drawn admiration, with fans calling them a stunning pair.”

item.title: Hidden Love Fame Zhao Lusi's SHOCKING Health Condition Of 'Depression, Abuse' Leaves Fans Furious With Her Com - Times Now
item.description:
Zhao Lusi's Health Crisis Sparks Outrage Among Fans

Publication Date: January 1, 2023 | Source: TNN

The health condition of Hidden Love actor Zhao Lusi has raised significant concerns among fans and the entertainment community, following reports of her hospitalization due to severe health issues attributed to emotional and physical stress in the industry.

  • Zhao Lusi collapsed on set and was hospitalized, sparking discussions about celebrity pressure and mental health.
  • Her agency confirmed she will suspend work commitments due to her health crisis.
  • Reports indicated she suffered from abuse and harassment related to her performance and appearance.
  • Fans have expressed their outrage on social media, demanding accountability from her management.
“There were five other people present at the scene…does that mean you can treat her this way?!”

The situation has captured widespread attention, highlighting the need for better mental health support within the entertainment industry as fans rally for Lusi's well-being.

item.title: Who Is Sivasri Skandaprasad? All About The Carnatic Singer Set To Marry BJP MP Tejasvi Surya - Free Press Journal
item.description:
Who Is Sivasri Skandaprasad? All About The Carnatic Singer Set To Marry BJP MP Tejasvi Surya

Date & Source: Published on: January 01, 2025, Source: unknown

Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) MP Tejasvi Surya is reportedly set to marry renowned Carnatic singer Sivasri Skandaprasad in Bengaluru. Although there hasn't been an official announcement, the wedding is anticipated to take place on March 4, 2025.

Key Points:

  • Sivasri Skandaprasad is a renowned Carnatic singer and holds degrees in Bioengineering, Bharatanatyam, and Sanskrit.
  • She gained fame after PM Modi praised her 2014 devotional song on YouTube.
  • Sivasri has ventured into playback singing, contributing to films like 'Ponniyin Selvan: Part 1.'
  • Tejasvi Surya is a lawyer and currently serves as an MP for Bengaluru South.
  • Both share a passion for sports and physical endurance activities.
"This rendition by Sivasri Skandaprasad in Kannada beautifully highlights the spirit of devotion to Prabhu Shri Ram. Such efforts go a long way in preserving our rich cultural heritage," - PM Modi

In conclusion, the upcoming union between Sivasri Skandaprasad and Tejasvi Surya is generating interest, promising to meld cultural heritage with public service in a high-profile marriage.

item.title: Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection day 27: Allu Arjun’s blockbuster set to cross Rs 1800 crore mark globally, aims for Dangal’s record next - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 27

Date & Source: January 1, 2024, Indian Express

Pushpa 2: The Rule experienced a significant boost in box office collections on New Year’s Eve, earning Rs 7.65 crore, bringing its overall gross close to the Rs 1800 crore mark globally.

  • The film has grossed Rs 1760 crore in its first 25 days.
  • Pushpa 2 earned Rs 1100 crore from its Hindi version alone.
  • The film broke the record of Baahubali 2 and is now closing in on Dangal's record of Rs 2070 crore.
  • Ticket price hikes and absence of competition are contributing to its success.
“If it manages to pass this figure, it will become the highest-grossing Indian hit of all time.”

With expected continued success, Pushpa 2 is poised to become a major milestone in Indian cinema.

item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor runs to give Alia Bhatt a hug, snuggles with Raha as they welcome New Year with Neetu Kapoor, Soni Razdan

Date: Jan 01, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Kapoor and Razdan families rang in the New Year together in a celebratory event on a huge lawn with fireworks.

  • Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor celebrated the New Year with their daughter, Raha Kapoor.
  • The families included Soni Razdan, Neetu Kapoor, and Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, among others.
  • Neetu shared joyful moments on Instagram, including a clip of Ranbir hugging Alia.
  • The celebration featured a picturesque outdoor setup next to a swimming pool.
  • Fans can look forward to Alia's film Alpha and Ranbir's upcoming projects like Animal Park.
“The party’s just begun, and 2025 is ready to shine! #NewYearVibes. Happy New Year, Instagram Fam.” - Riddhima Kapoor Sahni

The warm family gathering highlights the joy of togetherness as they welcomed the New Year with love and laughter.

item.description:

Global star Ram Charan is set to thrill audiences with his new film Game Changer, a political drama directed by Shankar Shanmugam, releasing on January 10, 2025.

item.title: Chinese Zodiac says 2025 is ‘Year of the Snake’; find out what that means for your zodiac sign - The Indian Express
item.description:
Chinese Zodiac says 2025 is ‘Year of the Snake’; find out what that means for your zodiac sign

Date: Not specified   Source: Indian Express

The upcoming New Year 2025 is designated as the Year of the Snake according to the Chinese Zodiac, which is viewed as a highly auspicious time. Experts highlight that this year will bring about transformation, wisdom, and positive changes, urging all zodiac signs to introspect and redefine their paths in life.

  • The Year of the Snake symbolizes wisdom, transformation, and growth.
  • Astrologer Kishori Sud emphasizes opportunities for personal development and introspection for all signs.
  • Each zodiac sign has specific themes and guidance for the year, focusing on their strengths and overcoming negative aspects.
  • The year encourages emotional healing, balance in relationships, and pursuing one's true purpose.
“2025 is supposed to be a good year for most. Those who may experience ups and downs must understand that these are opportunities for you to grow as a person.” - Kishori Sud

As we enter the Year of the Snake, it is a time for positive change, introspection, and transformative growth for every zodiac sign.

item.title: 'It Ends With Us' director Justin Baldoni files $250 MILLION lawsuit against The New York Times for libel - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Justin Baldoni Sues The New York Times for $250 Million Over Libel Claims

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

Director Justin Baldoni has filed a $250 million lawsuit against The New York Times for alleged libel regarding claims made about Blake Lively in the publication.

  • Baldoni claims that the article in question contains false information.
  • The lawsuit demands compensation for damages resulting from the alleged libel.
  • Baldoni is seeking to clear his name and restore his reputation.
“This is an attack on my character and the integrity of my work,” Baldoni stated.

This lawsuit underscores the ongoing tensions between public figures and media outlets regarding accurate reporting and the potential for significant financial repercussions for libelous claims.

item.title: Anurag Kashyap opens up about why Kennedy wasn’t released, says he has lost the energy to fight: ‘Five of my films are lying unreleased’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Anurag Kashyap opens up about why Kennedy wasn’t released, says he has lost the energy to fight: ‘Five of my films are lying unreleased’

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Anurag Kashyap reveals the ongoing challenges with the release of his film Kennedy, expressing disappointment and frustration with the current film industry's focus on profit over creativity.

  • Kashyap's film Kennedy premiered at the 2023 Cannes Film Festival but remains unreleased.
  • He has five projects currently in limbo and has distanced himself from Kennedy.
  • He criticizes the film industry for being more concerned about profits than filmmaking quality.
  • Kashyap feels disillusioned with the industry and contemplates moving out of Mumbai.
“I have made five films that are lying unreleased. Where is Kennedy? And whose hands is Kennedy in?” — Anurag Kashyap

Kashyap's revelations highlight a troubling trend in the film industry prioritizing financial success over artistic integrity, leaving many talented filmmakers feeling defeated.

item.title: Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt divorce settlement: ‘Malaficient’ star hopes her ex-husband will now ‘stop a - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt divorce settlement: ‘Malaficient’ star hopes her ex-husband will now ‘stop attacking her’

Publication Date: Not availableSource: Not available

Angelina Jolie expresses hope that her ex-husband Brad Pitt will cease his ongoing disputes against her amidst their divorce settlement.

  • Jolie wishes for an end to the conflict surrounding their past relationship.
  • Reports indicate ongoing legal battles over custody and property.
  • The couple has been in a lengthy divorce process since 2016.
“I hope he will stop attacking me,” said Jolie.

This article highlights the significant emotional and legal struggles faced by both parties as they navigate their divorce.
